snippet: Long-running hearings for whether a giant telescope can be built atop a Hawaii mountain have wrapped up. But it will be a while before a decision is made on a project that has prompted intense protests by those who believe it will desecrate sacred...

headline.main: 'Beauty and Beast' Gay Character Sparks Christian Boycott Calls
headline.print_headline: 'Beauty and Beast' Gay Character Sparks Christian Boycott Calls

lead_paragraph: Long-running hearings for whether a giant telescope can be built atop a Hawaii mountain have wrapped up. But it will be a while before a decision is made on a project that has prompted intense protests by those who believe it will desecrate sacred land.
